attributes.action: Give a pay rise to all key workers working during the Covid-19 pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Key workers are putting their lives at risk every time they go to work and most are earning minimum wage for doing so. Key workers are constantly put into dangerous situations and are under appreciated for all they do.
attributes.background: Give a pay rise to all key workers who are working during the Covid-19 pandemic. They should be given more than just a thank you and a clap every week for risking their lives.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for setting the salary of most key workers, or setting minimum wages for particular sectors, but you may wish to sign petitions calling for the following actions:

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

Pay bonus to all key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

Consider how to compensate key workers for their efforts during Covid-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172

Make hazard pay mandatory for key workers in the midst of COVID 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
